verses.verse: וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> she-mu-'El, And Samuel וַיִּקָּבְצ֤וּ <S%H6908><s%> vai-yik-ka-ve-Tzu were gathered together כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El and all the Israelites וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <S%H5594><s%> vai-yis-pe-du- and lamented ל֔וֹ lo, וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <S%H6912><s%> vai-yik-be-Ru-hu him and buried בְּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> be-vei-To him in his house בָּרָמָ֑ה <S%H7414><s%> ba-ra-Mah; at Ramah וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיֵּ֖רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vai-Ye-red and went down אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> mid-Bar to the wilderness פָּארָֽן׃ <S%H6290><s%> pa-Ran. of Paran ס sa-Mek

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish And [there was] a man בְּמָע֜וֹן <S%H4584><s%> be-ma-'on in Maon וּמַעֲשֵׂ֣הוּ <S%H4639><s%> u-ma-'a-Se-hu whose possessions בַכַּרְמֶ֗ל <S%H3760><s%> vak-kar-Mel, [were] in Carmel וְהָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish and the man גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol great מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, [was] very וְל֛וֹ ve-Lo צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon sheep שְׁלֹֽשֶׁת־ <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-shet- and he had three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand וְאֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> ve-'E-lef and a thousand עִזִּ֑ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim; goats וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בִּגְזֹ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> big-Zoz and he was shearing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנ֖וֹ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-No his sheep בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> bak-kar-Mel. in Carmel

וְשֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem Now the name הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish of the man נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val, [was] Nabal וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To of his wife אֲבִגָ֑יִל <S%H26><s%> 'a-vi-Ga-yil; Abigail וְהָאִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H802><s%> ve-ha-'ish-Shah and [she was] a woman טֽוֹבַת־ <S%H2896><s%> toat- of good שֶׂ֙כֶל֙ <S%H7922><s%> se-chel understanding וִ֣יפַת <S%H3303><s%> Vi-fat and of a beautiful תֹּ֔אַר <S%H8389><s%> To-'ar, countenance וְהָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish but the man קָשֶׁ֛ה <S%H7186><s%> ka-Sheh [was] churlish וְרַ֥ע <S%H7451><s%> ve-Ra' and evil מַעֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H4611><s%> ma-'a-la-Lim in his doings וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he; כָלֶבֹו chal-vov ככָלִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> cha-lib-Bi. care for ק

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גֹזֵ֥ז <S%H1494><s%> go-Zez did shear נָבָ֖ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val that Nabal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנֽוֹ׃ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-No. his sheep

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent out דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah ten נְעָרִ֑ים <S%H5288><s%> ne-'a-Rim; young men וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David לַנְּעָרִ֗ים <S%H5288><s%> lan-ne-'a-Rim, unto the young men עֲל֤וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu Get you up כַרְמֶ֙לָה֙ <S%H3760><s%> char-Me-lah to Carmel וּבָאתֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> u-va-Tem and go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val, to Nabal וּשְׁאֶלְתֶּם־ <S%H7592><s%> u-she-'el-tem- ask counsel ל֥וֹ lo בִשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> vish-Mi him in my name לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> le-sha-Lom. favor

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H559><s%> va-'a-mar-Tem And thus shall ye say כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> koh and thus לֶחָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> le-Chai; to him that liveth וְאַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you שָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H7965><s%> sha-lOm [in prosperity] Peace וּבֵיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> u-vei-te-Cha [be] to thine house שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, [be] both to thee and peace וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לְךָ֖ le-Cha שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom. and peace

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now שָׁמַ֔עְתִּי <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti, And now I have heard כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that גֹזְזִ֖ים <S%H1494><s%> go-ze-Zim that thou hast shearers לָ֑ךְ Lach; עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah, now הָרֹעִ֤ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im now thy shepherds אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לְךָ֙ le-Cha הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu have been עִמָּ֔נוּ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Ma-nu, them לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הֶכְלַמְנ֗וּם <S%H3637><s%> hech-lam-Num, which were with us we hurt וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor נִפְקַ֤ד <S%H6485><s%> nif-Kad missing לָהֶם֙ la-Hem מְא֔וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> me-'U-mah, them not neither was there ought כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei unto them all the while הֱיוֹתָ֥ם <S%H1961><s%> he-yo-Tam have been בַּכַּרְמֶֽל׃ <S%H3760><s%> bak-kar-Mel. they were in Carmel

שְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> she-'Al Ask אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נְעָרֶ֜יךָ <S%H5288><s%> ne-'a-Rei-cha thy young men וְיַגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> ve-yag-Gi-du and they will shew לָ֗ךְ Lach, וְיִמְצְא֨וּ <S%H4672><s%> ve-yim-tze-'U find הַנְּעָרִ֥ים <S%H5288><s%> han-ne-'a-Rim thee Wherefore let the young men חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen favour בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thine eyes כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov in a good בָּ֑נוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-nu; for we come תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- give נָּ֗א <S%H4994><s%> Na, Please אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whatever תִּמְצָ֤א <S%H4672><s%> tim-Tza I pray thee whatsoever cometh יָֽדְךָ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-de-Cha to thine hand לַעֲבָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dei-cha, unto thy servants וּלְבִנְךָ֖ <S%H1121><s%> u-le-vin-Cha and to thy son לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. David

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came נַעֲרֵ֣י <S%H5288><s%> na-'a-Rei young men דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And when David's וַיְדַבְּר֧וּ <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-be-Ru they spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נָבָ֛ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val to Nabal כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim according to all those words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh these בְּשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> be-Shem in the name דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; of David וַיָּנֽוּחוּ׃ <S%H5117><s%> vai-ya-Nu-chu. and ceased

וַיַּ֨עַן <S%H6030><s%> vai-Ya-'an answered נָבָ֜ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val And Nabal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַבְדֵ֤י <S%H5650><s%> 'av-Dei servants דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David's וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David's וּמִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> u-Mi Who בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- is the son יִשָׁ֑י <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai; Jesse הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm now a days רַבּ֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> rab-Bu abundance עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim, servants הַמִּתְפָּ֣רְצִ֔ים <S%H6555><s%> ham-mit-Pa-re-Tzim, that break away אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from אֲדֹנָֽיו׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nav. his master

וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ti Shall I then take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לַחְמִי֙ <S%H3899><s%> lach-Mi my bread וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מֵימַ֔י <S%H4325><s%> mei-Mai, and my water וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et טִבְחָתִ֔י <S%H2878><s%> tiv-cha-Ti, and my flesh אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose טָבַ֖חְתִּי <S%H2873><s%> ta-Vach-ti that I have killed לְגֹֽזְזָ֑י <S%H1494><s%> le-go-ze-Zai; for my shearers וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and give לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> la-'a-na-Shim, to men אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, whom I know אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> 'ei how מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh he הֵֽמָּה׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah. like

וְלַאֲבִיגַ֙יִל֙ <S%H26><s%> ve-la-'a-vi-Ga-yil Abigail אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife נָבָ֔ל <S%H5037><s%> na-Val, Nabal's הִגִּ֧יד <S%H5046><s%> hig-Gid told נַֽעַר־ <S%H5288><s%> na-'ar- of the young men אֶחָ֛ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad But one מֵהַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> me-han-ne-'a-Rim men לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold שָׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Behold David מַלְאָכִ֧ים׀ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers מֵֽהַמִּדְבָּ֛ר <S%H4057><s%> me-ham-mid-Bar out of the wilderness לְבָרֵ֥ךְ <S%H1288><s%> le-va-Rech to salute אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲדֹנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-nu our master וַיָּ֥עַט <S%H5860><s%> vai-Ya-'at and he railed בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.
